meanings.sent1: The lion outkilled the hyena in the hunt.
meanings.sent2: The hunter outkilled all his competitors in the shooting competition.
meanings.sent3: The ninja outkilled the zombies with ease.
meanings.sent4: The virus outkilled the body's defenses in a swift attack.
meanings.sent5: The poison outkilled the weeds in the garden, leaving only the flowers.

meanings.definition: To have killed more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: The soldier outkilled his enemy in the battle.
meanings.sent2: The serial killer outkilled all his victims without remorse.
meanings.sent3: The cat outkilled the mouse, leaving a mess for the owner to clean up.
meanings.sent4: The disease outkilled the previous outbreak in terms of casualties.
meanings.sent5: The storm outkilled the power, leaving the town in darkness.
